description: SUPERNATURAL SILVER VALLEY! Nestled atop Rockridge lies sought after Archstone. Expansive end unit w/ rare extra wide floor plan lives like a home. Dramatic main has 9' ceilings, sun drenched living room, large dining room, powder room & designer kitchen. Boasting an oversized quartz island, S/S apps & custom cabinetry. Enjoy a sunny balcony just off the kitchen; perfect for morning coffees or BBQing. Upstairs find 3 spacious beds w/ BONUS 4th bed below OR office/rec/gym space. Double side by side garage fits a full size truck + massive driveway fits 3 additional vehicles . Tons of street parking right out front of the fully fenced yard. Immaculately kept home that shows brand new. Explore lakes & trails, breweries, amazing golf courses, top of the line schools & local farm fresh shops!
